name: Fall Fast (TheTrashDev)
description:
Don't Fall is a game where you have to try and stay in the air to collect as many coins as possible. You have a limited time, so don't waste it! Use the flying TNT:to try and stay up longer.  When you do go down, hit the trampoline to propel yourself back up, or risk a game over.  Tip: You get more points from coins further away from the trampoline!

Controls:

D or left arrow to move left

A or right arrow to move right

W or up arrow to rotate clockwise

S or down arrow to rotate anticlockwise

Note: If you get a highscore, just refresh the game to see it on the leaderboard

Credit: 

TheTrashDev - Programming and Art

Nexade - Music and SFX
